user1: [user1] Yes, please summarize and tell me the essence of the contract

[bot] The document outlines a collaborative project between OpenGov and C.O.N.T.R.A.C.T. to develop a new contract system, aiming to eliminate confusion and streamline procurement processes. The project will involve phases of prototype development, testing, and refinement, with a timeline spanning from October 2026 to Transition in 2027. Key features include AI-powered assistance, a redlining experience, and a full transition to the new system.
